title: The Battle of Hoth
author: digdudemax
pages:
The Battle of Hoth
Date: 3 ABY
Result: Imperial
victory
Echo Base destroyed
Rebel retreat







The rebels were
forced to retreat
following a ground
invasion by the Empire.
The AT-ATs
overwhelmed the
rebels as they were
unable to destroy
their armour. Some
were able to be
destroyed by tow
cables pulling the legs
down and Luke
Skywalker throwing a
grenade into another.
Darth Vader
eventually landed on
the planet and the
Millenium Falcon
narrowly escaped his
reach.
